definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Essentially, nerds paying for girls to play video games with them.
sentences.chinese: 本质上是这些网虫们为与其一起玩游戏的女孩付费。

sentences.english: Addicted webworms lose not only their time , but money as well.
sentences.chinese: 上瘾的网虫不仅浪费了时间，还浪费了金钱。

sentences.english: Addicted webworms lose not only their time, but money as well.
sentences.chinese: 着迷的网虫不仅浪费了时间，也浪费了金钱。

sentences.english: I am only a unfamous network.
sentences.chinese: 我是一只无人知道的小网虫。

definition: a guy who stays at home all the time, typically spending a lot of time playing online games (derived from Japanese "otaku")
to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
die-hard otaku (sb who hardly ever emerges from their home, where they play games, watch movies etc)
otaku, a Japanese term for people with obsessive interests such as anime, manga, and video games/see also 宅男[zhai2 nan2]/see also 宅女[zhai2 nu:3]
